(200097,100051,'2015-05-28 22:31:38','Active','200097',100002,200027,NULL,101332,100019,201113,1000000039,'100019',160,1,0,'2015-05-14 13:42:00','2015-05-14 13:42:00','2015-05-28 22:31:38',1,224,224,2,115,0,0,2800.00,90.00,1454.55,0.00,0.00,'1B01')
(200097,100051,'2015-05-29 22:25:19','Draft' ,'200097',100002,200027,NULL,101332,100019,201113,1000000039,'100019',140,1,0,'2015-05-14 13:42:00','2015-05-14 13:42:00','2015-05-29 22:25:19',1,224,224,2,100,0,0,2800.00, 0.00,1262.41,0.00,0.00,'1B01')

SELECT order_id, COUNT(*) AS pieces_printed, labels_printed 
  FROM Pieces
  LEFT JOIN Orders ON Orders.id = Pieces.order_id
  HAVING pieces_printed != labels_printed 
  GROUP BY order_id
